thread.title: OTC Markets Group Announces Fourth Quarter and Year-End 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: OTC Markets Group Announces Fourth Quarter and Year-End 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 26, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- OTC Markets Group Inc. (OTCQX: OTCM) today announced it will report its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 31, 2017, after the close of the U.S. capital markets on Tuesday, March 6, 2018.
In addition, the Company will host a conference call on Wednesday, March 7, 2018, at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time, during which management will discuss the financial results in further detail. The conference call and replay of the conference call may be accessed as follows:
Dial-in Numbers: 1-877-407-9124 (Domestic); 1-201-689-8584 (International)
Replay Dial-in Numbers (Available until April 7, 2018): 1-877-481-4010 (Domestic); 1-919-882-2331 (International); Replay PIN Number: 26121
The earnings release and transcript to the earnings call will also be available in the Investor Relations section of the corporate website at www.otcmarkets.com/investor-relations/overview .
About OTC Markets Group Inc.
OTC Markets Group Inc. (OTCQX: OTCM) operates the OTCQX速 Best Market, the OTCQB速 Venture Market, and the Pink速 Open Market for 10,000 U.S. and global securities. Through OTC Link速 ATS, we connect a diverse network of broker-dealers that provide liquidity and execution services. We enable investors to easily trade through the broker of their choice and empower companies to improve the quality of information available for investors. To learn more about how we create better informed and more efficient financial markets, visit www.otcmarkets.com .
OTC Link ATS is operated by OTC Link LLC, member FINRA/SIPC and SEC regulated ATS.
